title: Bjorix The Brave: A Tale of Ancient Mercia
description: Bjorix the Brave is an action-adventure fantasy novella set in the dark ages kingdom of Mercia. It contains swashbuckling adventure, political intrigue, romance and sorcery.Bjorix the Brave is a tale of a tormented hero in a struggle against a monstrous and conspiratorial tyranny. When he sees all that he holds dear in jeopardy, Bjorix the Brave will summon the strength to prevail over the nightmare forces alligned against him.
author: Cedric Foster Gilbert-Rolfe
